about_the_game:
Vehicular Rampage is an over-the-top action packed driving game where your goal is to cause as much destruction, death, and mayhem as possible! Playable in both VR and normal modes!

- Explore multiple locations filled with secrets and fun pop culture Easter Eggs to find!

- Complete Unique Goals in each stage such as finding secret areas or destroying specific objects within the time limit.

- Kill pedestrians with your car to extend your time. Watch their body flop around with real time ragdoll physics or enjoy seeing them explode in to pieces if you've reached a high enough speed, pieces that also have ragdoll physics!

- Destroy glass and other objects in the environment, either to complete goals or just for fun!

- Customize your car and hand color! (More customizations coming soon)

- Rock out to an original soundtrack produced by the developer. Purchase includes a free download of the game's soundtrack as well!
detailed_description:
Vehicular Rampage is an over-the-top action packed driving game where your goal is to cause as much destruction, death, and mayhem as possible! Playable in both VR and normal modes!

- Explore multiple locations filled with secrets and fun pop culture Easter Eggs to find!

- Complete Unique Goals in each stage such as finding secret areas or destroying specific objects within the time limit.

- Kill pedestrians with your car to extend your time. Watch their body flop around with real time ragdoll physics or enjoy seeing them explode in to pieces if you've reached a high enough speed, pieces that also have ragdoll physics!

- Destroy glass and other objects in the environment, either to complete goals or just for fun!

- Customize your car and hand color! (More customizations coming soon)

- Rock out to an original soundtrack produced by the developer. Purchase includes a free download of the game's soundtrack as well!

name: Vehicular Rampage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1 gigahertz (GHz) or faster processor or SoC
  • Graphics: Onboard graphics processing
  • Storage: 460 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 gigahertz (GHz) or faster processor or SoC
  • Graphics: RX 560 or greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Conteúdo sexual
Atos criminosos

short_description: Strap in, start your engine, and get ready to start your rampage! Tear through multiple interesting locations that are packed with fun easter eggs, all while tearing through hoards of terrified pedestrians. Revel in a retro visual style and feel while enjoying modern driving physics and controls!
